title.rendered: Digital distribution services for independent and self-publishing musicians

content.rendered:
Digital distribution can be complicated

Digital distribution services make it easier and cheaper than ever before. They can shrink your time and financial investment. Each distribution service has its pros and cons. Many are simple but make details hard to control. Some make mistakes.

iTunes, Spotify, Amazon, Google Play

Radio and YouTube promotion also go hand in hand, as well as digital advertising on the Google and Facebook ecosystem (something we do) to promote your brand and releases.
